```{r}
wildfires<-geojson_sf("https://opendata.arcgis.com/datasets/5da472c6d27b4b67970acc7b5044c862_0.geojson")

wf_cl<-wildfires%>%
  filter(GISAcres > 1000)%>%
  st_transform(3857)%>%
  st_simplify()

?st_simplify()

ggplot()+
  geom_sf(data=select(wf_cl, GISAcres))

us<-us_states()%>%
  filter(name!="Hawaii" & name!="Puerto Rico")

us_states()%>%
  filter()
  as_tibble()%>%
  View()

ggplot()+
  geom_sf(data=us)+
  coord_sf(xlim=c(-177, -70))

```
